title: Coronation Street spoilers: Daniel and Bethany grow closer after Sinead dies
text:
Daniel Osbourne (Rob Mallard) is struggling greatly with the prospect of losing wife Sinead Tinker (Katie McGlynn) in Coronation Street, and after the young woman dies in the coming episodes, his grief naturally gets worse. However, Bethany Platt (Lucy Fallon) offers him a shoulder to cry on — much to Beth Tinker’s (Lisa George) dismay.

Daniel has been growing closer and closer to Bethany and the pair are set to share a romantic moment this week, as they share a passionate kiss —prior to Sinead’s death. However, after Sinead dies, he’s overcome with grief and emotion — and Bethany offers him support.

Coronation Street has revealed that, after Daniel defends her, Bethany later stumbles upon him grieving — and simply cannot walk by and leave him.

As a result, Bethany heads over to Daniel and offers him a shoulder to cry on. It seems to be a comfort to him — that is, until Beth finds the two together, and is fuming as a result.

Tensions and emotions are high, and Beth accuses Daniel of having an affair before Sinead is even cold.

How will Daniel react to Beth’s accusation? He’s clearly devastated over Sinead’s death, so he’ll no doubt be incredibly hurt by these harsh words.

Will more confrontation ensue?

Coronation Street returns on Monday 21st October at 7:30pm and 8:30pm on ITV.
